entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is being dragged upright by a centaur's arm. He sees Umbridge being borne away through the trees.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione too had been pulled to her feet by a centaur.

entities.name: umbridge

entities.name: ronan
entities.description: Ronan is speaking from behind Harry.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: Hermione mentions that they are not Ministry of Magic employees.

relationships.description: Harry sees Umbridge being borne away through the trees by Bane.

Ronan shakes Harry by the neck of his robes.
